Pack_of_cards - Class in Model.Card
 
Pack_of_cards() - Constructor for class Model.Card.Pack_of_cards
Constructor: Constructs a new Pack_of_cards and initializes all the necessary variables.
pawnForceMove(Player, int) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player in relation of his MovePosition
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player according to his MovePosition
pawnmove(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player in relation with his dice
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player according with his dice
pawnPayDay(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player to the PAY DAY Position
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player and sends it to the PAY DAY Position
pawnreset(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player to the Start Position
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player and sends it to the Start of the Board

This class represents the Mail Card Pay the Neighbor

Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Buyer
Observer: Asks the Player what Deal Card he wants to sell and then sells it.(removes it from the Player)
post-condition: Asks the Player what Deal Card he wants to sell then Adds the Sell_Money of the Deal card to the Money of the Player.
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Deal_Position
Observer: Draws a Deal Card
post-condition: Draws a Deal Card
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Family_Casino_Night
Observer: Checks the dice of the Player P1.If it is 1,3,4 then the Player gives 500 to the Jackpot, else if it is 2,4,6 then the Player gets 500
post-condition: If the dice of the Player P1 is 1,3,4 then 500 are removed from the Money the Player and added to the Jackpot , else if the dice is 2,4,6 then 500 are added to the Money of the Player
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Lottery
Observer: Asks the Players to chose a number from 1 to 6 and then rolls a dice, whoever guises correct then takes 1000 , if both wrong the rolls the dice again
post-condition: Asks the Players for a number from 1-6 ,then rolls a dice and whoever guises correct then 1000 are added to his Money , if both wrong then rolls dice again
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Mail_Position_1
Observer: Draws a Mail Card
post-condition: Draws a Mail Card
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Mail_Position_2
Observer: Draws 2 Message_Cards
post-condition: Draws 2 Message_Cards
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.PAY_DAY
Observer: Gives the Player P1 2500 and balances his Bills and Loans, then checks if he has finished the game and then sets his position to 0 (if he still plays)
post-condition: Adds 2500 to the Money of Player P1, the balances his bills and Loans(and do all the necessary stuff for that) and then check if the player has any months left , if true then sets the position of the Player P1 to 0 ,else if false he sets the boolean is_finished of Player P1 to true if the Player has already Finished Rolls the dice and the dice is 4,5,6 the give 250 to the other Player
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in interface Model.Position.Position
Observer: Does what the position says.
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Radio_Contest
Observer: Rolls a dice for both Players and whoever has the biggest number wins 1000, if both Players have the same number then they roll again
post-condition: Rolls a dice for both Players and the one with the biggest number adds 1000 to his Money, if both Players roll the same number then the roll again
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Sweepstakes
Observer: Rolls a dice for the Player P1 and wins the number of the dice x 1000
post-condition: Rolls a dice for the Player P1 and adds 1000x(dice) to the Money of the Player P1
Perform_Action(Player, Player) - Method in class Model.Position.Yard_Sale
Observer: The Player P1 rolls a dice and gives 100x(dice) to the bank, then takes the top Deal Card for free
post-condition: the Player P1 rolls the dice and removes 100x(dice) from his Money and then then moves the top Deal Card to his Cards
Player - Class in Model.Player
This class represents a Player
Player(String, int) - Constructor for class Model.Player.Player
Constructor: Constructs a new Player with the given Name and Month and sets all the other variables
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Player with the given name and Month and also initializes some other variables of a Player like his starting Money Loan and Bills, his dice and position and MovePosition, his Jackpot, the booleans Finished and HasPlayed and the Card and SeconfCard for the Cards that picks up and all the Arrays needed for his Cards
Position - Interface in Model.Position
This is the interface of a Position that contains the methods signatures for every Position
Position_Setup(BoardGUI, Player, Player, Pack_of_cards, Board) - Static method in class Controller.Controller
Observer: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player
post-condition: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player (Moves the Cards to the Players hand, finds his new MovePosition, updates the Players, infoBox and Jackpot, throws the Cards from the Players hand to the Pile)
